item.title: About
item.description: Hello Namaste to all! My name is Krishna. I am originally from Nepal currently living in the US. My academic training and daily work is in data domain; building systems and processes to make data informed decisions. My hobby outside work is in history, religion, languages and how these evolved over time and space. Will be ussing this blog to catalog information that I find interesting on these topics. Everything that I post here is for educational purpose.
